tutorial.quick_start.basics.description:
This game is [key.flavour.negative](hard.) Prepare to [key.flavour.negative](die a lot.)
Firstly, there is an [key.flavour.important](in-built), [key.flavour.important](pseudo-wiki) in this game.[key.style.break_small]Hold [key.control.control_mod] when you see [key.flavour.important](coloured) text.[key.style.break_small]If the text [key.flavour.important](glows), you can [key.flavour.important](click) on it to read more. [key.mechanic.tutorial_text](Try it!).
When you enter the [key.flavour.important](Dungeon), your goal is to reach the [key.flavour.important](next floor) by whatever means possible until you reach the end of the [key.flavour.important](Dungeon).
Floors are [key.flavour.important](randomly generated) each run and contain a multitude of enemies for you to fight, as well as some tantalizing loot for you acquire.
[key.flavour.important](Chests) will spawn throughout the Dungeon and can be opened to acquire better gear.
[key.flavour.important](Inventory Management) plays a large role in this game. You can open your inventory with [key.control.inventory].
You will [key.mechanic.damage](inevitably take Damage) during your run.[key.style.break_small]When this happens, you can [key.flag.healing](Heal) using your [key.item_tag.flask] by pressing [key.control.quick_heal].
You can use your [key.item_tag.flask] a number of times equal to your [key.stat.flask_charges.max], which is [key.variable.static](2) by default.
You can restore your [key.stat.flask_charges] by reaching a [key.mechanic.fountain].
One [key.mechanic.fountain] spawns each floor and will [key.flavour.positive](fully restore) your [key.stat.flask_charges].
key.mechanic.tutorial_text.tooltip.name: Tooltips
key.mechanic.tutorial_text.tooltip.descr:
You can click on this panel to drag it around!
In fact, you can even open another tooltip by clicking [key.mechanic.tutorial_text_two](here!)
key.mechanic.tutorial_text_two.tooltip.d:
You can show as many tooltips as you want.
You can also [key.flavour.important](Left Click) outside a tooltip to close [key.flavour.important](all) tooltips.
If you [key.flavour.important](Right Click) outside a tooltip, you will close everything [key.flavour.important](except the first) tooltip you opened.
